md:
giải nghĩa từ "calculate" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

* Calculate (verb) - Tính toán, tính toán lại
	+ Meaning: to find the answer to a mathematical problem by using numbers and doing mathematical operations.
	+ Example: "Can you calculate the total cost of the items on the list?"
	+ Related words: computation, calculation, math, arithmetic

* Calculate (verb) - Dự đoán, ước lượng
	+ Meaning: to make an intelligent guess or estimate about something.
	+ Example: "The company calculates that it will make a profit of 10% this quarter."
	+ Related words: forecast, predict, estimate, guess

* Calculate (verb) - Xét đoán, cân nhắc
	+ Meaning: to think carefully about the possible effects or consequences of something.
	+ Example: "She calculated the risks and decided not to invest in the stock."
	+ Related words: consider, weigh, ponder, deliberate
html:
giải nghĩa từ "calculate" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

  • Calculate (verb) - Tính toán, tính toán lại

    • Meaning: to find the answer to a mathematical problem by using numbers and doing mathematical operations.
    • Example: "Can you calculate the total cost of the items on the list?"
    • Related words: computation, calculation, math, arithmetic

  • Calculate (verb) - Dự đoán, ước lượng

    • Meaning: to make an intelligent guess or estimate about something.
    • Example: "The company calculates that it will make a profit of 10% this quarter."
    • Related words: forecast, predict, estimate, guess

  • Calculate (verb) - Xét đoán, cân nhắc

    • Meaning: to think carefully about the possible effects or consequences of something.
    • Example: "She calculated the risks and decided not to invest in the stock."
    • Related words: consider, weigh, ponder, deliberate
